description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Fractopia uses the power of your Xbox graphics processor to enable fast, interactive exploration of the beauty of the Mandelbrot and Julia fractals. Math has never been so pretty!
description.short: Fractopia uses the power of your Xbox graphics processor to enable fast, interactive exploration of the beauty of the Mandelbrot and Julia fractals. Math has never been so pretty!
